articles.author: Patrick Svitek
articles.title: Biden thanks Americans for ‘love and support’ after prostate cancer diagnosis - The Washington Post
articles.description: “Cancer touches us all,” the former president said as he spoke out for the first time since it was revealed he was diagnosed with aggressive form of prostate cancer.
articles.content:
Former president Joe Biden thanked Americans on Monday for their love and support, a day after it was disclosed he has been diagnosed with an aggressive form of prostate cancer.
